effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.x-y: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
